column2: title
Structural - Error: DB030 - Duplicate ID numbers
Structural - Error: DB130 - Household data record is missing in H-file (or to drop) or DB130/DB135 not filled correctly
column7: (DB130 = 11 and DB135 = 1 and HB030 = .) or (DB130 ne 11 and HB030 ne .)

column2: Structural - Error: DB135 - Records are missing in R- or P-file or DB135 not filled correctly
Structural - Error: DB135 - In R- or P-file records to drop (or are missing) or DB135 not filled correctly
Structural - Error (follow-up): DB110 = 1,2,3,4,5,6,7 or 10 => must be 1,2,8 or 9 in previous year
Structural - Error (follow-up): DB110 = 8 or 9 => household should not exist in previous year
Structural - Error (follow-up): DB110=1 and (DB130=21 or DB130_F=-1) in previous year => household should be dropped
column7: a.DB010+1 = b.DB010 and a.DB110 = 1 and (a.DB130 =21 or a.DB130_F = -1)

column2: Structural - Error (follow-up): DB110 = 2 and (DB120 in (21,23) or DB120_F = -1 or DB130 = 21 or DB130_F = -1 ) in previous year => household should be dropped
column7: a.DB010+1 = b.DB010 and a.DB110 = 2 and (a.DB120 in (21,23) or a.DB130_F = -1 or a.DB130 =21 or a.DB130_F = -1)

column2: Structural - Error (follow-up): DB110 = 3,4,5,6,7 or 10  in previous year => household should be dropped
Structural - Error (follow-up): DB110 = 8 and (DB120 in (21,23) or DB120_F = -1 or DB130 = 21 or DB130_F = -1 ) in previous year => household should be dropped
column7: a.DB010+1 = b.DB010 and a.DB110 = 8 and (a.DB120 in (21,23) or a.DB130_F = -1 or a.DB130 =21 or a.DB130_F = -1)

column2: Structural - Error (follow-up): DB110 = 9 and (DB120 in (21,22,23) or DB120_F = -1 or DB130 in (21,22,23,24) or DB130_F = -1 ) in previous year => household should be dropped
Structural - Error (follow-up): Interview not accepted for 2 consecutive years => household should be dropped
column7: a.DB010+1 = b.DB010 and a.DB135 not  = 1 and b.DB135 not  = 1

column2: Structural - Error: DB110 must be 9 for household first time in survey
Structural - Error: DB110 must be 8 for split-off household first time in survey
Longitudinal - Error:  DB075 must be the same every year
Longitudinal - Error: DB040 must be the same every year if household is at the same adress
column7: b.DB110 = 1 and a.DB010+1 = b.DB010 and a.DB040 ne b.DB040

column2: Longitudinal - Error: DB100 must be the same every year if household is at the same adress
column7: b.DB110 = 1 and a.DB010+1 = b.DB010 and a.DB100 ne b.DB100

column2: Structural - Error: RB030 - Duplicate ID numbers
Structural - Error: RB030 - Corresponding household does not exist in D-file
Structural - Warning: RB210 - Age and basic activity status may be not consistent
Structural - Warning: RB245 - Age and eligibility are not consistent
column7: RB245_F ne -2 and ((AGE >= 16 and RB245 not in (1,2,3)) or (AGE < 16 and RB245 in (1,2,3)))

column2: Structural - Error: RB245 - Codes 1 and (2,3) cannot be mixed within the same household
Structural - Error: RB245 - Only one person can be selected respondant in the same household
Structural - Error: RB250 - Data can be collected only from eligible persons
Structural - Error: RB250 - Personal data record is missing in P-file or RB250 not filled correctly
column6: RB030 = PB030 and RB010 = PB010 and a.RHID = b.PHID

column2: Structural - Error: RB270 - Proxy is not household member or does not exist
column6: a.RB270 = b.RB030 and a.RB010 = b.RB010 and a.RHID = b.RHID
column7: a.RB270_F ge 0 and  a.RHID ne b.RHID

column2: Structural - Error: RB270 - The person cannot be proxy for himself
Structural - Error (follow-up): RB110 = 1,5 or 6 => must be 1,2,3 or 4 in previous year
column7: a.RB010+1 = b.RB010 and b.RB110 in (1,5,6) and a.RB110 not in (1,2,3,4)

column2: Structural - Error (follow-up): RB110 = 2,3,4 or 7 => household member should not exist in previous year
Structural - Error (follow-up): RB110 = 5,6 or 7 or RB110_F = -1 in previous year => household member should be dropped
Structural - Error: RB110 must be 1 for household  first time in survey
Structural - Error: RB110 must be 2 in the new household for a sample person moved from another household
column3: a.RHID,a.RB010,a.RB030,a.RB100,a.RB110,a.RB120,b.RHID as _RHID,b.RB010 as  _RB010,b.RB030 as _RB030,b.RB110 as _RB110, c.DB010, c.DB030, c.DB135
column6: (a.RB030 = b.RB030 and a.RHID ne b.RHID and a.RB010 = b.RB010) and b.RHID = c.DB030 and b.RB010 = c.DB010
column7: a.RB100 = 1 and a.RB110 = 5 and a.RB120 = 1 and b.RB110 ne 2 and c.DB135 = 1

column2: Structural - Error: A sample person moved from another household must have RB110=5 and RB120 = 1 in the prevoius household
column6: a.RB030 = b.RB030 and a.RHID ne b.RHID and a.RB010 = b.RB010
column7: a.RB100 = 1 and (a.RB110 ne 5  or a.RB120 ne 1) and b.RB110 = 2

column2: Structural - Error: RB100 - If 4 year rotational panel: Person should be sample person
column7: RB110 = 1 and DB110 = 9 and (RB245 in (1,2) or (RB245 = 4 and AGE ge 14)) and RB100 ne 1

column2: Structural - Error: RB100 - If 4 year rotational panel: Person should not be sample person
column7: RB110 = 1 and DB110 = 9 and (RB245 not in (1,2) and (RB245 = 4 and AGE lt 14)) and RB100 ne 2

column2: Longitudinal - Error:  RB100 must be the same every year
Longitudinal - Error:  RB070 - Month of birth must be the same every year
Longitudinal - Error:  RB080 - Year of birth must be the same every year
Longitudinal - Error:  RB090 - Sex must be the same every year
Longitudinal - Warning:  RB220 - Father should be the same every year
Longitudinal - Warning:  RB230 - Mother should be the same every year
Longitudinal - Error:  RB245 - Respondant status (16+) must be the same every year
Longitudinal - Error: RB040 must be the same every year if person was in this household in previous waves
column7: b.RB110 = 1 and a.RB110 in (1,2,3,4) and a.RB010+1 = b.RB010 and a.RB040 ne b.RB040

column2: Structural - Warning: RB080 RB090 - Age at date of interview is -1
Structural - Error: HB030 - Duplicate ID numbers
Structural - Error: HB070 - Person who filled in the questionnaire is not household member or does not exist
column7: HB070_F ge 0 and   RHID ne HB030 and RB110 ne 5

column2: Structural - Error: HB080 - Person 1 responsible for the accomodation is not household member or does not exist
column7: HB080_F ge 0 and   RHID ne HB030  and RB110 ne 5

column2: Structural - Warning: HB080 - Age of Person 1 responsible for the accomodation is below 16
Structural - Error: HB090 - Person 2 responsible for the accomodation is not household member or does not exist
column7: HB090_F ge 0 and   RHID ne HB030  and RB110 ne 5

column2: Structural - Warning: HB090 - Age of Person 2 responsible for the accomodation is below 16
Structural - Error: HB080 - Person 1 and person 2 responsible for the accomodation cannot be the same person
Structural - Error: PB030 - Duplicate ID numbers
Structural - Error: PB130 PB140 PB150 - Birth date and sex must be equal in R- and P-file
column7: ((PB130_F ge 0 and PB130 ne RB070) or (PB140_F ge 0 and PB140 ne RB080) or (PB150_F ge 0 and PB150 ne RB090)) and RB030 ne  .

column2: Longitudinal - Error: DB030 - Household should exist in following year (or should not be in the file at all)
column7: a.DB135 = 1 and b.DB030 = . and a.DB010 ne &yy2

column2: Longitudinal - Error: RB030 - Household member should exist in same houshold in following year
column9: a.DB010 = &yy2 and a.DB110 ne 9 and a.DB135 = 1 and ((RB010 = DB010 and RB110 = 1) or RB010 = DB010-1) and count(RB030) = 1

column2: Relationchip - Error: RB220 - Father is not household member or does not exist
column6: a.RB220 = b.RB030 and a.RB010 = b.RB010 and a.RHID = b.RHID

column2: Relationchip - Error: RB220 - The person cannot be his own father

column2: Relationchip - Error: RB230 - The person cannot be his own mother
Relationchip - Error: RB240 - Spouse/partner is not household member or does not exist
column6: a.RB240 = b.RB030 and a.RB010 = b.RB010 and a.RHID = b.RHID

column2: Relationchip - Error: RB240 - The person cannot be his own spouse/partner
Relationchip - Error: PB160 PB170 PB180 - Parents and/or spouse/partner must be equal in R- and P-file
column6: PB030 = RB030 and RB010 = PB010 and RHID = PHID
column7: ((PB160_F ge 0 and PB160 ne RB220) or (PB170_F ge 0 and PB170 ne RB230) or (PB180_F ge 0 and PB180 ne RB240)) and RB030 ne  .

column2: Relationchip - Error: RB240 - The spouse/partner is not the same for both
column6: a.RB240 = b.RB030 and a.RB010 = b.RB010 and a.RHID = b.RHID

column2: Relationchip - Error: RB240 - Parents of spouses/partners must be different
column3: a.RB010,a.RHID,a.RB030,a.RB220,a.RB230,a.RB240,b.RB030 as s_RB030,b.RB220 as s_RB220,b.RB230 as s_RB230,b.RB240 as s_RB240
column6: a.RB240 = b.RB030 and a.RB010 = b.RB010 and a.RHID = b.RHID
column7: (a.RB220_F ge 0 and  a.RB220 = b.RB220) or (a.RB230_F ge 0 and  a.RB230 = b.RB230)

column2: Relationchip - Error: RB220 - Sex of father cannot be female
column6: a.RB220 = b.RB030 and a.RB010 = b.RB010 and a.RHID = b.RHID

column2: Relationchip - Error: RB230 - Sex of mother cannot be male
column6: a.RB230 = b.RB030 and a.RB010 = b.RB010 and a.RHID = b.RHID

column2: Relationchip - Warning:  RB230 - Child should be at least 15 years younger than its mother
column3: a.RB010,a.RHID,a.RB030,a.RB070,a.RB080,a.AGE,a.RB230,b.RB070 as m_RB070,b.RB080 as m_RB080,b.AGE as m_AGE
column6: a.RB230 = b.RB030 and a.RB010 = b.RB010 and a.RHID = b.RHID
column7: a.RB230_F ge 0 and b.AGE - a.AGE < 15 and a.AGE ge 0 and b.AGE ge 0

column2: Income - Error: HY020 - Must be equal or greater HY022
Income - Error: HY022- Must be equal or greater HY023
Income - Warning: HY020 - Great difference between total and components

column2: Income - Warning: PY010G - Big difference in income from one year to the next year

column2: Income - Warning: PY010N - Big difference in income from one year to the next year
